changeSet.createView: SELECT lower((ct.lg_meta)::text) AS lg_meta, lower((ct.intake_type)::text) AS intake_type, par_ct.id AS parent_cat_id, lower((par_ct.intake_type)::text) AS parent_intake_type, cd.lg_sys_id, cd.parent_lg_sys_id AS parent_sys_id, sc.logical_id AS lg_log_id, ct.use_log_id, sc.category_id AS lg_cat_id, btrim((sc.description)::text) AS lg_shrt_dsc, btrim((sc.sub_category_description)::text) AS lg_lng_dsc, sc.other_code AS lg_oth_cd, cd.intake_code, btrim((cd.intake_display)::text) AS intake_display FROM ((((intake_lov_categories ct JOIN intake_lov_codes cd ON ((ct.id = cd.cat_id))) JOIN system_codes sc ON ((sc.id = cd.lg_sys_id))) LEFT JOIN intake_lov_codes par_cd ON ((par_cd.lg_sys_id = cd.parent_lg_sys_id))) LEFT JOIN intake_lov_categories par_ct ON ((par_ct.id = ct.parent_cat_id))) WHERE (cd.omit_ind = false) UNION ALL SELECT NULL::text AS lg_meta, ict.intake_type, NULL::bigint AS parent_cat_id, NULL::text AS parent_intake_type, NULL::integer AS lg_sys_id, NULL::integer AS parent_sys_id, icd.intake_code AS lg_log_id, true AS use_log_id, NULL::character varying AS lg_cat_id, NULL::text AS lg_shrt_dsc, NULL::text AS lg_lng_dsc, NULL::character varying AS lg_oth_cd, icd.intake_code, icd.intake_display FROM (intake_only_lov_categories ict JOIN intake_only_lov_codes icd ON ((ict.id = icd.cat_id))) WHERE (icd.omit_ind = false);
